feed.title: Logdy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Logdy:
entry.content:
Utility commands

Oftentimes, the files we're working with are big and can contain many millions of lines. Currently, Logdy does not handle well, processing these big files hence why a new command mode has been introduced. Read more

ANSI code stripping by default

By default Logdy will now ignore ANSI code sequences. Read more

Bugfix: Disappearing rows after settings change

Rows no longer disappear after changing settings whether it's adding/removing a column or modifying a middleware.

entry.title: New release for Logdy: v0.13.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix readLine by @kropptrevor in https://github.com/logdyhq/logdy-core/pull/41
  • Fix forward subcommand bugs by @kropptrevor in https://github.com/logdyhq/logdy-core/pull/43
  • Add Dockerfile to enable Docker workflow and usage by @pataquets in https://github.com/logdyhq/logdy-core/pull/56
  • Dockerfile minor improvements. by @pataquets in https://github.com/logdyhq/logdy-core/pull/59
  • Optimize docker image size by @borosr in https://github.com/logdyhq/logdy-core/pull/61

New Contributors

  • @kropptrevor made their first contribution in https://github.com/logdyhq/logdy-core/pull/41
  • @pataquets made their first contribution in https://github.com/logdyhq/logdy-core/pull/56
  • @borosr made their first contribution in https://github.com/logdyhq/logdy-core/pull/61

Full Changelog: https://github.com/logdyhq/logdy-core/compare/v0.13.0...v0.13.1
